entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:08 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Temperature: 4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 4.2°C
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Temperature rising to 13 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then clearing. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to 13 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
